code: import{Grid}from'@mui/material';import'../Styles/ScrollDownIndicator.css';import ScrollToComponent from'../Utils/ScrollToComponent';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Description=function Description(){var textTitle={fontSize:'9vw',textShadow:'1px 3px 11px rgba(0,0,0,.3)',letterSpacing:'2.2px',textTransform:'uppercase',fontFamily:'Poppins-Medium',fontWeight:'600',color:'white',margin:'0',boxSizing:'border-box',lineHeight:'1'};var descriptionTitle={fontSize:'22px',textTransform:'uppercase',color:'white',fontFamily:'Poppins-Medium',wordWrap:'break',textAlign:'center',marginTop:'10px'};var CVTitle={fontSize:'18px',color:'white',fontFamily:'Poppins-Medium',wordWrap:'break',textAlign:'center',margin:'20px'};var openCV=function openCV(){var pdfLink='https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CLXfSv4yNowfwsxguZd_bcUkcSGIaWF3/view?usp=drive_link';window.open(pdfLink,'_blank');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,direction:"column",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center",style:{height:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:textTitle,children:"nouiri adil"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{style:descriptionTitle,children:"Computer science, Front end & App Developer."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,style:{backgroundColor:'#66d9ed',borderRadius:'15px',paddingTop:'5px',paddingBottom:'5px',cursor:'pointer',textAlign:'center'},onClick:openCV,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:CVTitle,children:"Download CV"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,onClick:function onClick(){ScrollToComponent('#expertise');},style:{position:'absolute',bottom:'40px',cursor:'pointer'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button scroll",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"scroll-down-arrow"})})})]});};export default Description;
